title: The Suite of Charms - Renovated studio in the heart of the naturist village of Cap d'Agde
invitation_description: We offer you The Suite of Charms, a fully renovated 18 m² studio, ideally located in the heart of the naturist village of Cap d'Agde, in the sought-after Port Nature 2 residence (North walkways, No. 68).
location_description: Just a few steps from the beach, shops, and entertainment areas, this studio offers an ideal setting for a carefree vacation, respecting the naturist spirit.

rules.title: Booking conditions
rules.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 7 days before arrival

practical_info.title: Practical information
practical_info.behavior: Reserved for people respectful of the naturist lifestyle.
practical_info.entry: Access card to the naturist village not included: to be collected at the village reception upon arrival (fees at your expense).
practical_info.transport: Airport transfer available on request (paid service).
practical_info.location: The establishment is located 15 km from Béziers-Cap d'Agde airport.
